title: European cities ranked worst for over-tourism 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Overtourism score (1-10) for 10 number of Tourist Placess.
The Overtourism score (1-10) is highest at Tourist Places Nantes France and lowest at Tourist Places Barcelona Spain.
The highest value at Tourist Places Nantes France is 1.76x times more than the lowest value at Barcelona Spain.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Tourist Places, and Overtourism score (1-10) in each Tourist Places on the y axis.
The Overtourism score (1-10) is highest at Tourist Places Nantes France and lowest at Tourist Places Barcelona Spain.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Overtourism score (1-10) for 10 number of Tourist Placess.
The Overtourism score (1-10) is highest at Tourist Places Nantes France and lowest at Tourist Places Barcelona Spain.

max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Tourist Places, and Overtourism score (1-10) in each Tourist Places on the y axis.
Tourist Places Nantes France has the highest Overtourism score (1-10) and Barcelona Spain has the lowest Overtourism score (1-10).
There is a difference of 1.56 between the maximum Tourist Places Nantes France and minimum Tourist Places Barcelona Spain.
Overtourism score (1-10) at Tourist Places Nantes France is 3.61 , second place is  at 2.05, and thirdly is Moscow Russia at 3.27.
The Tourist Places Barcelona Spain has 1.25 times less Overtourism score (1-10) than average.
Summing up the values of all Tourist Placess, we get total 28.78.
